textAlignment.description: Provides text alignment options for the block. Does not affect alignment when used in columns or when nested in other blocks.
Provides text alignment options for the block. Does not affect alignment when used in columns or when nested in other blocks.

useMatterportLink.description: Turn this on to override the link above with the matterport link from Everest. A url or page selection should still be supplied above, but if this is is turned on it won't be used.

TrackingEvent.description: An optional field that allows users to trigger a custom GA tracking event when clicked.

alignment.description: Provides text alignment options for the block. Does not affect alignment when used in columns or when nested in other blocks.

pattern.description: Choose whether to display a directional pattern effect on the image or disable entirely.

components.name: atomSpacedTitle
components.description: Block to add title with letter spaces

title.description: Add the '*' symbol to indicate how many characters a word will be moved.

hideFirstMins.description: Do you want to hide the 'mins' note from the first item?

residentSince.description: This will be prefixed with 'Resident Since', so please only add a year/date in this field.

residentSignature.description: This should be either an SVG or a PNG

brandVideo.description: Choose a video to represent the video branding used on various blocks throughout the site including the Hero, Footer and Featured Listings sections. Selecting a video will override the background image.

locationPoisTitle.description: Back up for whenever the location map is used and the titles aren't set. Useful for the single room pages.

footerFormTitle.description: This is the text inside the orange box.

footerNavigation.description: This is the first set of links in the footer.

hideIconsOnMobile.description: This will hide the icons but still display the text.

title.description: This is the text that shows in the header.

navItems.description: Create new nav item stories in data/nav-items. These can then be selected here.

displayContact.display_name: Do you want to display the contact information?
displayContact.description: Turn this on to add the sites contact information under the nav.

columns.description: Add 2 Paragraph blocks to split them over 2 columns.

invertOrder.description: Enabling this will place the carousel on the left on desktop, and the text content on the right on desktop.

components.name: sectionCardsBlock
components.description: A single block for multiple cards

body.description: Multiple cards allowed which will form a grid - best in 3s.

components.name: sectionFaqBlock
components.description: A collection of FAQs with a 'category' title.

components.name: sectionFaqBlockScanner
components.description: A block that scans for FAQs on the page, and then generates hotlinks to them.

items.description: Add the apartments you would like to feature.

featuredTitle.description: Title that displays when viewing featured homes.

featuredSubtitle.description: Subtitle that displays when viewing featured homes.

recentTitle.description: Title that displays when viewing recently viewed homes.

recentSubtitle.description: Subtitle that displays when viewing recently viewed homes.

thinnerThanFullWidth.description: Enable this to have your text a little thinner than full width, around 80-85%.

displayOpeningDate.description: Turn this on to display the opening date set in the global options.

showMediaCaptions.description: Enabling this will show the media captions if they exist.

invertOrder.description: Enabling this will place the carousel on the left on desktop, and the text content on the right on desktop.

media.description: Add between 1 and 2 images. Adding a single image will make the image span the entire width of the screen. Adding 2 images will display them side by side.

title.description: Used for accessibility to describe standalone graphic.

options.name: All You Need In One Place

direction.description: Choose the content direction of the text and carousel columns.

imagePattern.description: Whether to apply / unapply the circular pattern on the image.

heroPrimary.description: Add the '*' symbol to indicate how many characters a word will be moved.

showMediaCaptions.description: Enabling this will show the media captions if they exist.

heroPrimary.description: Add the '*' symbol to indicate how many characters a word will be moved.

media.description: If no images are present a title-only hero section will be displayed.

showMediaCaptions.description: Enabling this will show the media captions if they exist.

featuredProperties.description: Choosing features homes here will add them to the top of the listings page. This is not required.

cardLabel.description: Adds a product sticker / label to product cards to convey concise information to users e.g. 'Recently let'.
